Articles.Content:
I saw the headbump method successfully exit Kerbals atmosphere, so decided to push things to the next level. 

I present the Starship: COLOSSUS.

Sporting a mighty 1 Kerbal of thrust the Colossus ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/tuPDwy6N6nA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
